CONTROL SCHEME:
Driver:
left stick - left side wheels
right stick - right side wheels
RB - turbo mode
LB - slow mode

Opperator:
Y - Level 3
X - Level 2
A - Level 1
B - go to 0
DPad_Up - elevator up ("fast")
DPad_Up_Right - elevator up ("slow")
DPad_Down - elevator down ("fast")
DPad_Down_Right - elevator down ("slow")
RT - intake
LT - outtake
Left Stick - manipulator long arm
Right Stick - manipulator short arm

    import java.util.Random;

    public class peoplestuff extends SubsystemBase {

        Random ass = new Random()

        public void CheerAF() {
            Human.Mouth.setVolume(1.00);
            Human.Mouth.setSpeech("PANDA-MONIUM");
        }

        public void GoToPitsAF() {
            while (!Human.Eyes.getPits()) {
                Human.Eyes.setSearch(true);
            } else while (Human.Eyes.getPits()) {
                //leg's act as pink arm, rotating on an axis until touching smth
                while (Human.Legs.onGroundRight()) {
                    Human.Legs.setRight(1.00);
                }
                while (Human.Legs.onGroundLeft()) {
                    Human.Legs.setLeft(1.00);
                }
            }

            while (Human.Brain.getPits()) {
                return true;
            }
        }

        public void CodeAF() {
            while(!Human.Brain.High) {
                Human.Brain.getDrugs();
            }
            while(Human.Brain.High) {
                Human.Fingers.Code();
            }
        }

        public void MechanicalAF() {
            Human.Fingers.Break();
            Human.Fingers.Break();
            Human.Fingers.Break();
            Human.Fingers.Break();
            Human.Fingers.Break();
            Human.Fingers.Break();
            Human.Fingers.Break();
            Human.Fingers.Break();
            Human.Fingers.Break();
            Human.Fingers.Break();

            Human.Arms.Break();
            Human.Head.Concussion();
            Human.Legs.Break();
            Human.Hands.Hurt();

            Human.Brain.Confusion()
        }

        public void CadAF(boolean insane) {
            if (insane) {
                Human.Hands.Break();
                Human.Brain.LockIn();                
            } else {
                Human.Brain.Insane();
            }
        }

        public void ElectricalAF() {
            if (!Human.Brain.PluggedIn) {
                Human.Brain.getPlug();
                Human.Brain.PlugIn();
            }
        }

        public void YapAF() {
            Human.Mouth.setVolume(inf);
            Human.Mouth.setSpeech(ass.pull());
            //the ass.pull function takes 100 random characters and has a topic for each one,
            //when using setSpeech, this will make the speaker talk about 100 random topics at once
        }

        public void DoSmthBro() {
            while (true) {
                System.out.println("fuck you, ur jst braindead now")
                System.exit(-1)
            }
        }

        public Command RUNTHISCONSTANTLY() {
            if (in_audience) {
                return(() -> {
                    CheerAF()
                    GoToPitsAF()
                })
            } else if (in_pits) {
                return (() -> {
                    CodeAF()
                    MechanicalAF()
                    CadAF()
                    ElectricalAF()
                    YapAF()
                })
            } else {
                return(() -> {
                    DoSmthBro()
                })
            }
        }
    }
